entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Localize messages from MSBuild targets #87435
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline completely broken #87434
    8.0.0
  • Failure in checked/release asm diffs pipeline #87432
    8.0.0
  • Consider extending JsonIncludeAttribute and JsonConstructorAttribute support to internal and private members. #87431
    8.0.0
  • Service Provider cannot resolve transient service from the Root scope if the `ValidateOnBuild` option is enabled #87429
  • [wasm][AOT] Vector256ByteShiftLeftTest - Cannot select: 0x55ee6da14cd0: v16i8 #87423
    8.0.0
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` doesn't always trigger a rejit without `COR_PRF_MONITOR_JIT_COMPILATION` enabled #87418
    8.0.0
  • WasmTemplateTests.ConsolePublishAndRun fails with exit code 137 #87414
    8.0.0
  • [Linux] X509 chains with user principal name (UPN) name constraints fail to build #87413
  • [iOS] Vector128 and Vector64 GetOne* test failures #87412
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_65937/Runtime_65937/Runtime_65937.dll #87409
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/MisSizedStructs_ArmArch/MisSizedStructs_ArmArch.dll #87408
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][7.0] Blazor Wasm debugger not working anymore #87407
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: add overloads with SocketAddress to Socket's SendTo and ReceiveFrom #87397
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1] System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException: "Culture is not supported." #87394
    8.0.0
  • [Mono]Undeclared identifier 'MDBGPROT_CMD_TYPE_GET_VALUES_ICORDBG' #87392
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default #87391
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/ConstantFolding/StaticReadonlySimd/StaticReadonlySimd #87390
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/arglist/vararg_TargetWindows/vararg_TargetWindows #87389
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_do/pinvokes_do #87388
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestLoadTests.HashAlgorithmLaxInLoad #87387

Closed

  • SafeHandle marshalling improvements in the source-generated marshalling #73496
    8.0.0
  • Json serializer code generator doesn't support internal constructors #77016
    8.0.0
  • Stack Overflow when using curried interface member, no stack overflow with tupled version #87393
    8.0.0
  • `Double.NegativeZero` is actually `+0.0` #85914
  • [Poison] Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler is consuming two PSB files #79712
    8.0.0
  • GC events appear to be broken with NativeAOT #82318
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] drop cjs follow-up #72990
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 crashes open a pop-up window #47552
    8.0.0
  • [browser][debugger][MT] PropertiesSortedByProtectionLevel #87314
    8.0.0
  • "dotnet-pgo dump" throws "Same type `X` used as both ValueType and non-ValueType" #61604
    Future
  • crossgen2 asserts: "OwningType == other.OwningType" in MethodWithToken.CompareTo #61732
    8.0.0
  • Add a JsonConverter.Type property. #63898
    8.0.0
  • [Performance] Startup regression #87235
    8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX embedded broadcasting support in xarch emitter #80825
    8.0.0
  • Interop analyzers don't warn if CustomMarshallerAttribute has invalid MarshalMode value #87139
  • MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests failures in CI #87275
    8.0.0
  • Trim Analyzer doesn't handle annotations on inferred generic arguments #86032
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 20 Regressions on 5/26/2023 9:55:14 AM #86904
    8.0.0
  • Reference assemblies should not be loaded for execution #84108
  • Test failure: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SelectTest.Select_ReadWrite_AllReady_ManySockets #75702
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Remove hacks to install libnuma in CI #87181
    8.0.0
  • Dynamic heap count perf regressions #87014
  • CoreXml.Test.XLinq.XNodeBuilderFunctionalTests.RunTests failed with mismatch #87358
  • dotnet --version leads to Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #87100

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0-staging] add RID for Debian 12 #87441
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] add RID for Debian 12 #87440
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF][Mono] Update HelloiOS.app publish folder path. #87439
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Change JitGuardedDevirtualizationChainStatements to 1 #87437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Diagnostics for ComClassGenerator #87436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • add RID for Debian 12 #87433
    area-Host
  • Fix missing GC counter data on non-Windows #87430
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #87428
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #87427
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.7.0 #87426
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Warn when user code casts between runtime-based COM interop types and source-generated COM interop types #87425
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't return `0` from `getMaxVectorByteLength` when intrinsics are disabled #87420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Avoid redundant unwind info lookup during stackwalks #87419
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix neutral cultures created with the underscore #87411
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • [browser][debugger][MT] Make operations on dictionary thread-safe. #87405
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Add more load PackedSimd methods #87403
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Properly check ISAs for static readonly simd fields #87402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle commas in physical promotion #87401
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dead code #87399
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix example of building a library. #87398
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix Double.NegativeZero #87364
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix neutral cultures created with the underscore #87415
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix neutral cultures created with the underscore #87417
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Configure ComInterfaceGenerator to be referenced by default #87422
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Release/7.0][PERF] Backport urllib fix to release/7.0 #87286
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Account for CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR in GT_LABEL; avoid double resolving #87395
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86617
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Tweak dotnet-pgo to be flexible to changes from class to valuetype for application types #87355
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 name mangling issue with MethodWithToken #87353
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a JsonConverter.Type property. #87382
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Clean up code, use DiagnosticInfo in LibraryImportGenerator, Cache well known attribute types in StubEnvironment #87348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Move System.Transactions.Local over to using source-generated COM instead of built-in COM whenever possible. #87351
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix official build's WASM legs #87416
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [Release/6.0][PERF]Forced Urllib to specific version and removed force-reinstall per (#87286) #87289
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Warn in CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • enable disabled Quic tests #87385
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix trim analyzer warning for inferred type arguments #87156
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][aot] Add @kotlarmilos as code owner for Mono AOT and iOS #87396
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up physical promotion heuristics #87376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes and improvements: #87218
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix xlinq outerloop tests #87386
    area-System.Xml

Updated

  • [release/7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.7 #86300
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.18 #86299
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, needs-author-action
  • Performance improvements for Random.Shuffle() #83305
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops for NonBacktracking engine #87369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix validation on build #87354
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow (#86508) #87339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow bigger json parsing to JsonDocument #87343
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser][MT] ConfigureAwait(false) ignored when JSSynchronizationContext is installed #87326
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make idSmallCns signed to allow including -1 #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shrink ManifestEnvelope.MaxChunkSize to hold extended data #87322
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Enable `System.Text.Json` tests AOT #87256
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • update snap authoring for June and resolve segfaults #87349
    area-Snap
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable GDV with multiple guesses for NativeAOT #87380
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix rooted connection when hanshake failed #87328
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos

    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241

  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster find unwind info on Unix #87204

    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

    area-System.Text.Json
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement fast shadow tail calls #2213

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use `OperExceptions` in div/mod lowering/codegen #2305
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use a universal stub for interface dispatch #2304

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a determinism issue in `lowerSpillTempsLiveAcrossSafePoints` #2299
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Introduce `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2302
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Put LLVM helpers into the `CorInfoHelpFunc` enum directly #2303

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tizen targets not recognized in TargetFrameworks list #33192

Closed

  • platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #32720
  • Installing the dotnet 7 SDK on Ubuntu Jammy seems to only install the runtime. #32804
  • When globally installing a tool, a reference to Microsoft.SourceLink.AzureRepos.Git is added causing NU1211 & NU1212 #33116

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap the 1205 and 1206 error codes #33189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2198336 #33169
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.1 to 20.3.2 in /eng/dependabot #33173
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow using latest illink analyzer on netstandard projects #33158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose EnableComHosting to analyzers #33185
    area-runtime
  • Add additional dependencies for PVP flow #33179
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.1 to 20.3.2 in /eng/dependabot #33174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

Updated

  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33159
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33160
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add test for catching duplicate error codes #33155
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog
  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set
  • Proposal: list-patterns on enumerables #6574
  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • Proposal: Fast, Efficient Unions #7016
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS3019 warning issued even when required to suppress CS3016 #68560
  • Remove unused imports on save #68556
  • [BUG] Move type to Classname.cs always puts file in project root #68555
  • Inline type hints cannot be triggered by shortcut #68554
    17.8
  • [SUGGESTION] Solution-wide analysis #104 #68553
  • "Move type to" code action using C# Dev Kit incorrectly moves the type to the root folder. #68550
    17.7 P4
  • CodeLens popup is empty 17.6.2 #68548
  • Incorrect error message on using static directive with alias to non-named type #68546
  • #line pragma false-positive error #68543

Closed

  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #68478
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Commas after non-array elements in JSON-like strings are colored incorrectly #68534

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge "interceptors" experimental feature to main #68564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test PR to track down test failures as I don't want to pollute main t… #68563
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove stale comments #68557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error reporting around inline array access. #68551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • update System.CommandLine to the latest version #68549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle no analyzers case in DiagnosticComputer #68545
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged
  • Avoid eagerly ordering the IMetadataAsSourceFileProviders #68544
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Performance, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix goto-def on partial methods in LSP #68559
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add more interceptors tests #68462
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68327
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid calling EnsureEventListeners from Workspace.Dispose #68552
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Point manual publishing to public feed #68558
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix non-deterministic ordering of quick actions #68547
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure adequate SemanticModel coverage for inline arrays. #68509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Extract a common helper for adding/getting private implementation class methods. #68502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove CPD attribute on DiaSymReader dependency #68523
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement IOperation support for `foreach` over an inline array. #68506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix missing comma classification in json classification #68535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68524
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation behavior of convert to block-body namespace #68428
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS 2022. ASP.NET Core with Angular. IIS Virtual Dir. #48739
  • Http2WebSocketTests.HEADERS_Received_SecondRequest_ConnectProtocolReset is flaky #48737
  • KestrelConfigurationLoaderTests.ConfigureEndpointDevelopmentCertificateGetsLoadedWhenPresent is flaky #48736
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #48734
  • HubProtocolVersionTests.ClientUsingOldCallWithNewProtocol is flaky #48733
  • Update Third Party Notices if needed #48727
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor Server conditional Keep-Alive #48724
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #48717
  • Using Metadata attribute to add attribute to some property of the class does not work #48686
  • Component containing modal not rendering #48588
  • Website times out...startup.config is never called #48665
